title: Jose Blanco Joins Us LIVE In Studio!
itunes:title: Jose Blanco Joins Us LIVE In Studio!
description: Dave is back from a week in the Dominican Republic and the TAA convention which features the top retailers in the country and a slew of limited edition smokes released just for the members. We will find out what's new, what's hot and what rumors were hot topics...We will also sit down with Jose Blanco and talk about Senorial with him and what he has planned for 2015. We'll get his take on Cuba, Wrappers and so much more...Join us for the shenanigans known as The Cigar Authority!
